name: Cranberry Chocolate chip Oatmeal cookies
description: These cookies are vegan and can be easily made to be gluten free too! Perfect for an afternoon snack
recipeIngredient: 2 Tablespoons oil (I use 1 Tbsp virgin coconut and 1 organic canola oil. or Use 1.5 Tbps nut butter and 1 Tbsp canola oil)
1.5 Tablespoons warm water or non dairy milk
3-4 Tablespoons raw sugar or equivalent sweetener (3 for moderate sweet)
1/3 cup whole wheat flour (Use Oat flour for gf)
2 Tablespoons all purpose flour or Spelt flour (Skip for gf)
1/8 teaspoon spices of choice (I use cloves and cinnamon powder)

recipeInstructions.text: In a bowl, add flaxmeal, warm water, agave, oils and sugar and mix for 2 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: In a bowl, add flaxmeal, warm water, agave, oils and sugar and mix for 2 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: In another bowl, whisk the flours, salt and baking powder well.
recipeInstructions.name: In another bowl, whisk the flours, salt and baking powder well.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the 1/4 cup flour mix, oats and cranberries or chocolate chips or both and/or almond slivers to the wet mix.
recipeInstructions.name: Add the 1/4 cup flour mix, oats and cranberries or chocolate chips or both and/or almond slivers to the wet mix.

recipeInstructions.text: Mix to combine well, add more flour (and oats), if the mix is too wet to form a slightly stiff doughy mix.
recipeInstructions.name: Mix to combine well, add more flour (and oats), if the mix is too wet to form a slightly stiff doughy mix.

recipeInstructions.text: Drops spoonfuls on parchment or greased baking sheet.
recipeInstructions.name: Drops spoonfuls on parchment or greased baking sheet.

recipeInstructions.text: Flatten a little and Bake 12-14 minutes at 350 degrees F until the edges are golden and the center is not runny.
recipeInstructions.name: Flatten a little and Bake 12-14 minutes at 350 degrees F until the edges are golden and the center is not runny.

recipeInstructions.text: Cool on rack for 2 minutes before finishing them off!
recipeInstructions.name: Cool on rack for 2 minutes before finishing them off!

keywords: chocolate cookies, easy recipe, vegan cookies
